UPSONIC_WORKERS_AMOUNT.description: The number of workers for the Upsonic API

API_WORKERS.description: The number of workers for the Upsonic API

RUNNER_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of runners for the Upsonic API

NEW_FEATURE_FLAG.description: New feature flag added in version 2.0

description: Comprehensive AI agent system that conducts deep company research, analyzes industry trends, performs financial analysis, and develops tailored sales strategies using DeepAgent with specialized subagents

company_name.description: Name of the target company to research (required)

company_symbol.description: Optional stock symbol (e.g., AAPL, TSLA) for financial analysis

industry.description: Optional industry name for focused industry analysis

enable_memory.description: Whether to enable memory persistence for session history

storage_path.description: Optional path for SQLite storage database file

comprehensive_report.description: Comprehensive research report containing company research, industry analysis, financial analysis, and sales strategy

research_completed.description: Whether the research was successfully completed
